STRINGS.GENERIC: [color=#4cf]On activate:[/color] All other Available abilities suffer Exert 2.
STRINGS.ALL_IN:
Increase this die's roll by twice the abilities exerted on ability activation.
[color=#4cf]On hit:[/color] If this rolled a 32 or higher, Stagger the target.

STRINGS.MOVE_UP_ACTIONS: [color=#4cf]On hit:[/color] Set the speed of {owner}'s remaining actions equal to the speed of the leftmost unit on the turn queue.

STRINGS.CRIT_DIE: [color=#4cf]On [shake]critical[/shake] hit:[/color] Consume all Critical to deal +50% damage per Critical consumed.

STRINGS.ANTI_BLOCK:
[color=#4cf]On clash vs. Block die:[/color] +4 to roll.
[color=#4cf]On hit:[/color] Inflict 2 Broken.
[color=#4cf]On hit:[/color] Inflict 2 Broken next round.

STRINGS.GENERIC:
Target self.
A random Unavailable ability gains Invigorate 1. Repeat this effect once.

STRINGS.PIERCE_PULL:
[color=#4cf]On hit:[/color] Pull 1.
[color=#4cf]On hit or clash lose:[/color] If the target is not within range 1, discard all remaining dice.

STRINGS.GENERIC:
[color=#4cf]On activate:[/color] Forward 2.
After activation, if the target is defeated, this ability has Cantrip and reset this ability's cooldown.

Target self.
Gain 4 Protection and 4 Poise Protection this round and next round.
AoE: Targets all enemies in a lane.

Target self.
Recover 33% of max HP. Recover 33% of max Poise.
[color=#4cf]On activate:[/color] If the target started this round in a different lane, add a Blunt 8-10 die to this ability.

STRINGS.PIERCE_PULL:
[color=#4cf]On hit:[/color] Pull 3.
[color=#4cf]On hit or clash lose:[/color] If the target is not within range 1, discard all remaining dice.

STRINGS.GENERIC:
Target self.
Gain an additional action next round.

STRINGS.SHRUG_OFF: [color=#4cf]On clash lose vs. Attack die:[/color] If the winning die had a roll of 4 or lower, reduce the winning roll to zero.

STRINGS.FIRST_DIE: [wave]This is a description[/wave]. On hit: Inflict [hint=This displays a hint.]Vulnerable[/hint], 2 Slow, and gain 2 Haste.

STRINGS.LETHAL_HIT_CYCLING: [color=#4cf]On [shake]critical[/shake] hit:[/color] Cycle this die (up to 2 times).

STRINGS.CLASH_LOSS_DIE: On clash lose: Discard all remaining dice on this ability.

STRINGS.GENERIC:
Target self.
Recover 33% of missing HP. Recover 33% of missing Poise.
